wisheshayen anuradhapura yugayedi buddha shasanaye diyunuwata, krushikarmaya naga situwimata saha podu janayage podu pahasukam sapayima sandaha ekala palakayan itha wishala karyabharayak sidu kara thibena bawata mema aithihasika sadhaka walin manawa pilibimbau we.

mema blog satahana kisidu wanijamaya aramunakin thora wana athara hudek danuma beda ganima mulika aramunu kota aththeya.emenma kisidu awasthawaka mehi samaji wirodhi ho asabhya yayi samajaya piliganna kisidu karunak ho seyaruwak wath pala nokerena athara oonama awasthawaka kuda daruwakuta wuwada rasawindaya haki saha danuma thaba gatha haki ayurin satahan thanannata nibanda uthsaha ganne , mage satahane palamu rasa windinna mage biridath , mage diyaniwarun dedenath wana nisama pamanak nowe , eya samajiya yuthukamak se ma salakana heyini.emenma yam thakshanika gatalu wala balapama harennata mage “sundara sinhala bhashawa “danna pamana niwaradiwa hasurawannatath , nisi thanhi ingrisi pada bhawitha karannatath mama nibanda wehesemi .

ee hama kenekutama sthuthi karanawa yayi dilrukshi kiwaya.luthithan nilantha wijewikramage athurudan wima pilibanda ahangama polisiya saha galla kotuwe pihiti dakunu palath wishesha aparadha wimarshana eekakaya mulika parikshana pawathwa wadidura parikshana katayuthu rahas polisiya wetha bhara di thibuni.ee anuwa parikshana pawathwu rahas polisiya mita wasara hathakata pera dumriyaka hapi miya giya bawa kiya nohandunana ayakuge mala sirurak galgamuwa podu susana bhumiye wala dama athi bawa anawaranaya kara gena thibuni.me mala sirura wasara hathak thisse athurudanwa siti luthithan nilantha wijewikramage bawata rahas polisiya wishwasa kaleya.eeta pasu rahas polisiya adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kala karunu matha galgamuwa mahesthrath lochana pradipa abewikrama mahathmiyage niyoga matha pasugiya juli masa 27 wani dina me mala sirura godaganu labiya.mala sirura goda ganu labu awasthawe luthithan nilanthage mawa wana hewawasam thuduwawaththage nimalawathi saha biriya dilrukshi athulu luthinange pawule gnyathihuda ehi sitiyaha.wasara hathakata pera athurudanwa siti nilanthage ghathanaya pilibanda galgamuwa adhikaranaye me wana wita nadu wibhagaya pawathwe..
